about_the_game:
Life of the stinky kid isn't easy… Even the teachers are giving you grief! Don't give me that "lather, rinse, and repeat" nonsense, these pheromones can't be stopped with a simple shower. Believe me he's tried!

Life does a 180 for Niito when he bumps into a woman who doesn't immediately recoil in disgust at his smell but even gives him a kiss on the cheek for being so helpful?! Only to find out, this is the new Chairwoman of the university he is enrolled in. Talk about a visual novel level twist!

Shortly after Sayaka's appearance, Niito gets wrapped up in Sayaka's scheme to help you unleash the potent powers of your pheromones & teach the professors who made your life a living hell a lesson only found in the hardcore Miel school of revenge!

The targets: Niizaki Yuuka, the naughty nurse whose dynamite bod can't be hidden beneath a lab coat. Ooi Kiyomi, forget 'Kiyomi-chan is a girl!' this tomboy is an absolute MILF! Fuji Takako, she disguised her "disgust" of your man-musk with a facade of sweet and wholesomeness, so it will surely be satisfying to destroy that attitude as you dick her down hard! Last but not least, Shirashi Michiyo, looks like the quintessential strict professor types with devastating pencil skirt + pantyhose combo and a sheer white blouse barely holding back her bountiful bust...

That can't be all right? What about Sayaka herself? Well, she may be the chairwoman, but Sayak- aham, Mommy-sensei will be waiting for you to check off all the bullies before she gives you a special lesson of love!

On your quest for payback, make sure to keep an eye out & get answers to important questions like: Who really is the mysterious Sayaka who appeared out of nowhere? And why were the teachers bullying you so mercilessly in the first place?


  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel
  • All the sexy senseis are fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue
  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants
  • Hours of riveting story content
  • Audio including music and special effects
  • Enhanced with character sprite animations
  • Gallery and Scene selections
  • 20 scenes full of content they never taught you in school!

Mommy Sensei: Horny Homework Is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Miel. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.

**PLEASE NOTE**
All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.

highlighted.name: I never want to wash my cheek again
She's got the voice of a horny angel
A different kind of warm up exercise
Nurse! Nurse! I need some help to make this swelling go down
Making a sex toy 101: Exploit their weakness

content_descriptors.notes:
- Large portions of the game include nudity and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.
- There are scenes of sexual intercourse involving pregnant characters.
- Characters are blackmailed/coerced into performing sexual acts.
- Some scenes include characters engaging in non consensual sexual acts.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Mommy Sensei: Horny Homework

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

short_description: Life isn't easy being the stinky kid… Luckily the chairwoman has got your back! She'll plot and scheme behind the scenes to help you get some Miel-style payback on the bitches who bullied you!
